forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a brilliant sun, casting warmth upon the city’s vibrant tapestry. The skyline, sharply defined against a cloudless azure, hints at midday’s gentle embrace, where the temperature flirts just above seventy, while the invincible west-southwest wind dances playfully, nudging the leaves and stirring the air. The Golden Gate Bridge stands sentinel in the distance, with only hints of the fog seen at its base, marooning the shimmering waters of the bay; this ignored marine layer gently whispers of the coolness from the ocean depths, still clinging within arm’s reach.

As the evening approaches, the warmth is expected to lilt into a comfortable coolness, resting tonight at a refreshing fifty-eight. Those venturing out may find the chill to warrant a light jacket, perhaps crafted from soft fabrics that allow a little breeze through, ideal for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet tête-à-tête at a cafe with outdoor seating. The day's clarity renders every mundane activity a delight, an invitation to explore the lesser-known corners of the city—a casual wander through the historic streets, perhaps a visit to a local gallery, or simply enjoying the sunset from Twin Peaks while the wind tousles hair with its familiar, refreshing caress.
